entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to regain feeling in his body. He is described as picking up his wand and climbing over debris.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person mentioned in the past tense, who died on a night when Harry was present.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is able to recognize one of the Death Eaters from old wanted posters.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is panicking and trying to figure out how they found them.

entities.name: dolohov
entities.description: A Death Eater who was paralyzed by Harry. He is recognized by Ron from old wanted posters.

entities.name: thorfinn rowle
entities.description: Another Death Eater mentioned by Ron, but not described in detail.

relationships.description: Harry paralyzed Dolohov with his magic. This is inferred from the text as Harry looks down at Dolohov and thinks fast.
Ron recognized Dolohov from old wanted posters. This is stated directly in the text.
